alertCaptcha.message: There is a captcha on this rating page that the extension cannot pass, you will need to manually pass it, the extension will notify you about this.

alertFocusedTab.message: Warning! At this monitoring, it is required that the extensions tab be active (focused), when you start auto-voting, the extension will automatically switch to the tab, which may distract your attention

appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.
appDesc.message: Automatic voting on ratings for projects or servers (gaming)

appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

authVK.message: To vote on $project$, authorization via VK is required

banAttention.message: Attention! There have been cases of blocking for auto-voting on this site, please use auto-voting on this site with caution, watch out for notifications and errors, if you are banned, then the author of the site has made a new bypass that determines that you are auto-voting, inform the extension developer if you are banned!

canceledVote.message: The vote was canceled by the user

captchaPassedDouble.message: It looks like the captcha was solved twice, and this is bad, maybe the page was loaded before the captcha was solved or there were some failures with the captcha, contact the extension developer for help.

chooseGameURL.message: Enter the game URL or select from the list

chooseListingURL.message: Enter the listing URL or select from the list

closeTab.message: Do you want to close this tab?

closedTab.message: It looks like you have closed the tab on which the extension auto-voted

confirmDisableCheckProjects.message: Are you sure you want to disable verification when adding a project? If you make an error when adding a project, voting might fail

confirmDisableErrors.message: Are you sure you want to disable error notifications? If any problem when voting happens, the extension will try to vote again every 5 minutes. If you don't receive errors and don't keep track of them, the extension might endlessly try to vote. Be careful with this, you might get blocked for spamming requests

confirmNow.message: This project is voting right now, this will cancel the voting that is currently underway, do you still want to restart the voting?

confirmPriority.message: Are you sure you want to give priority to this project? When you enable priority, if you don't have precise time set this may lead to late voting. Set the precise time (accurate to seconds) and don't change it for correct voting process

confirmQueue.message: There is a project in the voting queue that is currently voting, this will cancel the voting that is currently underway, do you still want to restart the voting?

confirmRestartExtension.message: Restart the extension? After restarting the extension, the settings will be closed and they will need to be manually reopened

confirmUninstallSelf.message: Do you really want to delete? All extension settings will be permanently deleted.

cooldownChanged.message: You must restart the extension to apply changes. After restarting, open settings again. Restart the extension?

cooldownError.message: Timeout in ms in case of an error

countVote.message: How many votes make per day

customTimeOut.message: Customize the time of the next vote (timeout)

debugTooltip.message: Enable this only if the developer has asked you to

deleteAllRating.message: Do you really want to delete all the added projects on this rating?

disableCheckProjects.description: Checkbox. Disable check when adding a project

disableCheckProjectsTooltip.description: Tooltip. Disable check when adding a project
disableCheckProjectsTooltip.message: Disabling this check-up is not recommended, it can cause errors in the extension and it can break the auto-voting process, this setting disables check-up when adding a project, check-up for MCRate (As you know, you can vote there only for once per day) It also disables the VK authorization This setting is not saved when saving the configuration

disableCloseTabsOnError.message: Disable closing tabs in case of unsuccessful completion of voting

disableCloseTabsOnSuccess.message: Disable closing tabs on successful completion of voting

disableNotifInfo.message: Notifications about successful voting are disabled

disableNotifStart.message: Notifications about voting start are disabled

disabledClickCaptcha.message: Don't click on "I'm not a robot"

disabledClickCaptchaTooltip.message: The extension will not click on "I am not a robot" in reCAPTCHA or hCaptcha, this is necessary if your captcha is automatically solved

disabledFocusedTabTooltip.message: Open a tab and switch to it automatically

disabledNotifWarnTooltip.message: For example, a notification that you have already voted (This is when the extension tried to vote for the project but you yourself have already voted)

disabledOneVote.message: Disable simultaneous voting on multiple sites at once

disabledRestartOnTimeout.message: Disable the restart of voting if it lasts too long

disabledSendErrorSentry.message: Disable sending error reports to the extension developer

disabledSendErrorSentryTooltip.message: About some errors, the extension sends an error report to the extension developer via the service Sentry.io , this report includes details of the error, a screenshot of the site (in the form of png and html) and also details of your settings (this is your nickname, on which site you vote and with which settings). You can disable this

disabledUseRemoteCode.message: Disable the use of remote code

disabledUseRemoteCodeTooltip.message: Some site owners are very actively struggling with this extension and trying to break it as much as possible. The extension now uses the remote code, which allows you not to update the extension and at the same time the code will always be up-to-date. If you disable the use of remote code, then you may encounter errors, we do not recommend that you do this. This option is more intended for the developer to debug local code.

disabledWarnCaptcha.message: Disable notifications about the need to manually pass the captcha

disabledWarnCaptchaTooltip.message: Disables notifications and logging that the captcha needs to be passed manually

discordLogIn.message: You must be logged in to upvote discord bots!

emptySite.message: It seems that this rating responded with an empty page

enabledSilentVoteTooltip.message: Quiet Mode (Recommended) - Vote for projects entirely in the background without opening any tabs. Emulation mode - emulates a real user, opens a tab and clicks on the voting button, it's better to leave at least one open tab in the browser, otherwise the browser will be open on top of other windows and may cause inconvenience.

errorAttemptVote.message: Exceeded the maximum number of voting attempts, $error$

errorAuthVK.message: VK authorization failed! Vote manually this time in order to fix this error

errorLink.message: $url$ is not supported by the extension. Please note that here you need to specify a link to monitoring (rating) and not to the project site itself (server). You can also try manual addition mode (switch on the bottom right)

errorLinkParam.message: According to the link you provided, we could not get the $param$ parameter, most likely you did not provide a complete link. You can also try manual mode (bottom right switch)

errorNextVote.message: Next voting attempt will be made in $minutes$ minutes

errorOpenTab.message: Error occurred while opening the tab: $error$

errorRedirected.message: Voting error! Redirection to the unknown page occurred: $url$ Check this URL

errorSelectSiteRating.message: The 'Rating Site' is specified incorrectly, select the one you need from the list

errorVoteNetwork.message: Error when voting! Error code: $code$ URL: $url$

errorVoteNoElement.message: Error! It seems that some necessary element (button or input field) is missing. Here's what we know: $error$. Report this error to the extension developer

expertModeTooltip.message: You will be given the ability to access the advanced settings, this function is intended for users who are well versed in computers and its subtle technical nuances.

failParseUrlFastAdd.message: Could not find the rating $rating$, inform the owner of the site $site$ about this error

feedback.message: If you have any questions or problems, feel free to contact us at

firstInstall.message: Thanks for installing the extension. For further work you should configure it first!

firstSettingsSave.message: Settings were successfully set by default and saved

gameIDTooltip.message: of the game can be obtained from the address bar of project page, for example:

grantUrl.message: Grant the extension access to rating(s)

internetDisconnected.message: Vote is initiated, but Internet connection is lost, waiting for it to resume...

lagServiceWorker.message: It looks like we can't contact the Service Worker (the background process of the extension), it probably freezes, let's try to restart the extension?

lastDayMonth.message: Apply custom timeout only on the last day of the month

lastDayMonth2.message: on the last day of the month

limitedModeButton1.message: I still want to use the extension on Opera despite the limitations

limitedModeButton2.message: I have read everything, followed all the instructions and realize that the extension will work in a limited mode

limitedModeContent.message: Before using this extension on the Opera browser, you should understand that the extension will work in a limited mode, this is:

limitedModeContent1.message: Tabs opened by the extension will not be grouped and you will not understand where the tab is opened by the extension, please note that you should not get into the voting process (except in the case when the extension asked you to manually pass the captcha), this can lead to errors

limitedModeContent2.message: Your browser will not work in the background, which means that when the voting time comes and your browser is closed (no tabs will be opened), voting will not begin until you start the browser.

limitedModeContent3.message: The extension does not have access to Google captcha, you will need to manually give this access otherwise the extension will not be able to click on 'I'm not a robot', you can find out how to grant access to Google captcha in this instruction:

linkPlaceholder.message: Insert a link to the rating here

listingIDTooltip.message: of the listing can be obtained from the address bar of project page, for example:

nickWithSpace.message: A space has been found in your nickname

nickWithSpaceConfirm.message: A space has been found in your nickname, do you really want to add with a space in your nickname?

notAdded.description: Notification. You haven't added any projects
notAdded.message: You haven't added any projects to this voting page yet!

notAddedAll.message: You haven't added anything here yet

notAvailableInSilent.description: Notification. available in silent voting mode
notAvailableInSilent.message: This is not available in silent mode by default!

notConnect.message: Failed to connect to $url$, HTTP response: $code$

notConnectInternet.message: It seems that you don't have an Internet connection or page is not available, see the details in the console

notConnectInternetVPN.message: It seems that you don't have an Internet connection or page is not available (Are you from Ukraine? Enable the VPN and keep it enabled while auto-voting), see the details in the console

notFoundProject.message: There is no such project! Check the correctness of the entered ID (and other parameters, if any)

notFoundProjectCode.message: There is no such project! HTTP response: $code$ Check the correctness of the entered ID (and other parameters, if any)

notFoundProjectRedirect.message: There was a redirect, most likely there is no such project! Check the URL: $url$ Also check the correctness of the entered ID (and other parameters, if any)

notGrantUrl.message: You did not grant the extension access to rating(s), adding it is not possible

notReadyInject.message: It looks like the tab started loading when the extension was not ready for it, this may lead to errors in voting

notRegVK.message: VKontakte authorization error: Registration is not completed (it looks like the phone number is not specified)

notSupportedBrowser.message: Opera is not supported by the extension

notSupportedBrowserContent1.message: Your browser is not supported by the extension. Please use any other Chromium-based browser (for example, Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Vivaldi, Yandex Browser, etc.)

notSupportedBrowserContent2.message: Why is Opera not supported by the extension? There are many reasons for this, there is no support for tab groupings, there is no access to the captcha (Google reCAPTCHA), there is no support for the File System Access API, there is no support for the background operation of the extension (when all browser tabs are closed), there is no activity on opera.addons.com (it is not possible to publish an extension there) and many other little things

notSupportedGroupTabs.message: It seems your browser doesn't support tab grouping

notSupportedSiteRating.message: It seems that according to the parameters you specified, the extension does not provide support for $rating$, are you sure that the data was entered correctly?

notificationsDisabled.message: Notifications are disabled or the extension doesn't have access to them! You may miss important notifications from this extension about errors or warnings!

now.message: There is a vote going on right now...

oldSettings.message: The settings of the old version $old$ have been detected, I am updating them to the new version $new$

oneProject.message: On $project$, you can only vote for $count$ project at once

oneProjectFairTop.message: You can only vote for one project on FairTop at once. In order to vote for multiple projects, do not allow FairTop.in to save cookies, google how to do it. Then disable check-up when adding a project in the advanced settings and try adding this project again. Be careful with the project ID: when adding a project with disabled check-up, extension will accept project even with a non-existent ID.

operaAttention.message: Attention! We found that you are using the Opera browser, with this browser there is a problem accessing Google captcha. Please follow the instructions below to give the extension access to Google captcha

ordinalWorldTooltip.message: World count number is the number that is located in the list of selected worlds when voting

passageCaptcha.message: Warning! reCAPTCHA/hCaptcha works on this rating, if you are often asked to pass a captcha manually (select images), you can find out how to solve this problem

priorityTooltip.message: When this option is enabled and after adding a project, the project will be prioritized, and will be first to vote without a delay of 10 minutes

privacyPass2.message: extension to get 5 free captcha passes for hCaptcha

privacyPass4.message: and follow the instructions. After set the cookies on hCaptcha, install any extension that can edit the cookies in the browser, for example

privacyPass5.message: and extend the validity of all cookies for the domain hcaptcha.com for a few years

projectDeleted.message: The project was deleted by the user

projectIDTooltip.message: of the project can be obtained from the address bar of project page, for example:

randomizeInput.message: Specify the randomization limits (min and max) in milliseconds

randomizeTooltip.message: Within the specified limits, the time of the next vote will be randomized, this is mainly necessary to make it harder for server admins to assume that you are using auto-voting

redirectedSecondBonus.message: There was a redirect to $url$, but looks like you are not logged in, or there is another problem. Check this URL

rejectDelete.message: Cannot be deleted while the voting is running, restart the extension if the voting is stuck

requiredConfirmTOS.message: The site requires you to confirm something

requiredNick.message: Where's the nickname? There is no Steam authorization button so i need a nickname and it's necessary

restartInQueue.message: This project is in the voting queue, restart is not possible.

restarted.message: The vote has been sent for restart

rewardAttention.message: Attention! With the parameters you specified, you will not receive a reward for voting! What's the point of voting if you don't get anything for it?

secondBonus.message: On $project$ you need to collect the reward as well, let's automate this?

settingsUpdateEnd2.message: Settings were successfully set by default and saved

storageError.message: An error occurred while reading the config: $error$

storageErrorSave.message: An error occurred while saving settings: $error$

timeStamp.message: the time stamp is set to

timeoutErrorTooltip.message: If a voting error occurs, the extension will wait for the specified time until the next voting attempt

timeoutHour.message: After the certain time (once per day)

timeoutMS.message: Timeout in ms. since the last vote

timeoutMonth.message: After the certain time (once per month)

timeoutTooltip.message: If you vote on the rating (monitoring) for several projects (servers), then at the end of the voting, the extension waits for the specified time before voting for the next project on the same rating

timeoutVoteTooltip.message: If the vote lasts too long, the extension will restart it after the specified time

timeoutWeek.message: After the certain time (once per week)

tooManyVoteAttempts.message: There have been too many voting attempts at a time, it seems something has broken. Inform the extension developer about this error

usedTranslator.message: It looks like you have used the translator built into the browser, please disable the translator, it interferes with the work of the extension. If this is not the case and you have disabled the translator, inform the extension developer

voteMode.message: Force the voting mode to be set
